message: Let's be fair and split the money almost evenly, Bob. This offer benefits both of us in the long run.
Let's split it evenly. No need for complications. We both get a good share.
Bob, my friend, time is ticking and our money is losing value. Let's settle this now. I'm proposing a slightly better deal for me, considering the inflation is hitting you harder.
Alice, the inflation is hitting us both, but I'm willing to compromise. I'll take a bit more this time, but let's try to avoid further losses.
Bob, this back-and-forth isn't helping anyone.  My offer is still reasonable, and every round we lose more. Let's be smart and close this deal.
Alice, we're both losing money with every round. I'm proposing a deal that is slightly more favorable to me, but at least we'll get something. Let's end this.

Bob, this is getting ridiculous.  We're both losing out because of your stubbornness. I'm taking a slightly larger share to compensate for the rounds we've wasted. Take it or leave it - but time is running out!
